description: Updates a certificate. Currently, you can use this function to specify whether to opt in to or out of recording your certificate in a certificate transparency log. For more information, see Opting Out of Certificate Transparency Logging.

parameters.name: CertificateArn
parameters.description: ARN of the requested certificate to update. This must be of the form: arn:aws:acm:us-east-1:account:certificate/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Use to update the options for your certificate. Currently, you can specify whether to add your certificate to a transparency log. Certificate transparency makes it possible to detect SSL/TLS certificates that have been mistakenly or maliciously issued. Certificates that have not been logged typically produce an error message in a browser. CertificateTransparencyLoggingPreference (string) --- You can opt out of certificate transparency logging by specifying the DISABLED option. Opt in by specifying ENABLED.

nested_params.name: CertificateTransparencyLoggingPreference
nested_params.description: You can opt out of certificate transparency logging by specifying the DISABLED option. Opt in by specifying ENABLED.
